constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
No login/authentication required anywhere in the app.
Keep the app simple and fast; avoid heavy assets/animations that harm mobile performance.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or the immutable hook/bootstrap paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement external databases or third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity exists, but this app must not require login).
Do not implement real-time features (WebSockets/chat) or any external social media integrations.
Do not collect or upload user videos/media; the punishment text is display-only and the app should not request camera/file permissions.
